data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuberan, G., Chakraborty, Rekha Devi, Purushothaman, P., Maheswarudu, G. (2018): Two new records of deep sea shrimp under the genus Parapontocaris (Crustacea: Decapoda: Crangonidae) from the southwestern coast of India. Zootaxa 4450 (5): 581-584, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4450.5.5
